paper_abstract: We show that, from a topological point of view, 2-tape Buchi automata have the same accepting power than Turing machines equipped with a Buchi acceptance condition. In particular, for every non null recursive ordinal alpha, there exist some Sigma(alpha)(0)-complete and some Pi(alpha)(0)-complete infinitary rational relations accepted by 2-tape Buchi automata. This surprising result gives answers to questions of Simonnet [Sim92] and of Lescow and Thomas [Tho90, LT94].
paper_title: On the accepting power of 2-tape Buchi automata
